ABOUT.TITLE: About Me
ABOUT.POSITION: Now, I am Full Stack Developer @ Accenture
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION_1: Passionate by Innovation, Computer Science and Information Systems, I am open to all proposals in Computers Science and IT using various systems and programming languages in the fields of Technology Consulting and Engineering, Finance and Banking.
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION_2: Rigorous, Spirit of initiative, analysis and synthesis, Strong organizational and Interpersonal skills, Capacity for the teamwork. Available immediately, geographically mobile and listen to the market.
